definition: to engage in fraud
to dance/to wield/to brandish
detriment/fraud/harm/defeat
to abuse one's position for personal gain (idiom)
see 徇私舞弊[xun4 si1 wu3 bi4]

sentences.english: No wonder we are seeing so many frauds on the market.
sentences.chinese: 也难怪我们在这个市场上看到了如此之多的舞弊。

sentences.english: I think there is quite a bit that auditors can do.
sentences.chinese: 我认为，审计师有很多方法可以发现这些舞弊。

sentences.english: He jobbed his son into the position.
sentences.chinese: 他用舞弊手段为儿子谋得这个职位。

sentences.english: Investigation of fraud was their commission.
These three factors, known as the fraud triangle, are pressure, opportunity and rationalization.
sentences.chinese: 这三个因素，又称舞弊三角，是压力，机会和借口。

sentences.english: He said he would never forger that I had accused him of cheating.
sentences.chinese: 他说他永远不会忘记我指控他的舞弊行为。

sentences.english: Party B causes great loss to Party A due to its breach of duty and jobbery.
sentences.chinese: 乙方严重失职，营私舞弊，给甲方利益造成重大损失。

sentences.english: Frauds often end up with overstated cash balances.
sentences.chinese: 舞弊常常导致现金与银行存款余额的虚增。

sentences.english: Practicing favoritism, when found, when abolition of school.
sentences.chinese: 徇私舞弊者，何时查出，何时取消学籍。

sentences.english: Government programs lend themselves so easily to waste, fraud and abuse.
sentences.chinese: 政府项目太适合被浪费，营私舞弊与滥用了。

sentences.english: Although Chaju was rigorous, there were still many embezzlement phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 察举法虽然法限严格，仍存在诸多舞弊现象。

sentences.english: Support a culture of fraud awareness and encourage the reporting of improprieties.
sentences.chinese: 树立舞弊防范意识，鼓励报告不正当的行为。

sentences.english: Chapter 2: Theory Analysis of the Factors of Fraudulent Financial Statements.
sentences.chinese: 第二章舞弊性财务报告产生因素理论分析。

sentences.english: How to Dissolve Labor Contracts on Grounds of Serious Dereliction of Duty or Practice of Graft?
sentences.chinese: 如何以劳动者严重失职或营私舞弊为由解除劳动合同？

sentences.english: An analysis of reported fraud in Government Departments together with anti-fraud guidance produced by the Treasury.
sentences.chinese: 分析报告欺诈政府部门与反舞弊的指导所产生的国债。

sentences.english: The election results were nullified because of voter fraud.
sentences.chinese: 因为选民舞弊，选举结果无效。

definition: to abuse one's position for personal gain (idiom)
see 徇私舞弊[xun4 si1 wu3 bi4]
to practice fraud/to cheat/to engage in corrupt practices
to practice fraud (idiom); by trickery
lack of discipline/to break a rule/to violate discipline/to breach a principle
covert activities (election rigging etc)/under-the-table manipulations/black operations
wrongdoing/failure to do one's duty
scandal
to use one's position for personal gain (idiom)
to be corrupt/corruption/to embezzle
to assume sb's name and take his place (idiom); to impersonate/to pose under a false name
corruption
to neglect one's duty/dereliction of duty/malpractice
to take a test or exam for sb
corruption
abuse of power
